hero_title: TRANSLATE COMICS INSTANTLY IN YOUR LANGUAGE
hero_sub: No downloads. No hassle. ComicTranslator brings every panel to life in your tongue.
hiw_desc: Our extension makes translating comics and manga simple and fast. Just follow these three easy steps.
hiw_step1_desc: Add to your browser in one click.
hiw_step2_desc: Load any comic or manga page.
feature_desc: Our extension offers robust tools that make translating comics and manga effortless and enjoyable.
feature1_desc: Automatically detect and translate text from any comic or manga image in seconds.
feature2_desc: Translate between Japanese, Chinese, Korean, English, Vietnamese and more.
feature3_desc: Easily edit translations or copy text directly from the comic panels.
feature4_desc: Automatically match the original font style for a seamless reading experience.
feature5_desc: Save your translation history and export it for future reference.
feature6_desc: Your data stays on your device. We don’t store or share your comic images.
pricing_desc: Select the option that works best for you, whether you need unlimited access or prefer to pay as you go.
testi_desc: Join thousands of satisfied users who are enjoying comics and manga in their own language.
testi_1_quote: ComicTranslator has completely changed how I read manga! I can now enjoy titles that haven’t been officially translated yet. The translation quality is impressive and the interface is super intuitive.
testi_2_quote: I use ComicTranslator for all my projects — it’s fast, accurate, and lets me check how my comics look in multiple languages without hassle.
testi_3_quote: Love the simplicity! Just upload or open my manga and boom — I can read everything in my language instantly. Totally worth it.
testi_4_quote: ComicTranslator has completely changed how I write manga! I can now enjoy titles that haven’t been officially translated yet and write in different languages.
faq_desc: Have questions? We’ve got answers about ComicTranslator.
faq_1_a: ComicTranslator scans your comic images, extracts text using OCR, then translates it into your selected language. The translated text is displayed directly over the original panels.
faq_2_q: Do I need to download any software?
faq_2_a: No, ComicTranslator works directly in your browser via a simple extension. Just add it to Chrome and you’re ready to go.
faq_3_a: We currently support Japanese, Chinese, Korean, English, Vietnamese, and more are coming soon.
faq_4_a: You can purchase a Daily or Monthly pass for unlimited usage, or buy tokens for pay-as-you-go access.
faq_5_a: Absolutely. All comic images are processed locally in your browser; we do not store or share your data.
footer_desc: Instantly translate comics and manga into your language. Simple, fast, and privacy-friendly.
